title: Unlikely Love
description: Scarlett is used to bailing her sister Ruby out of trouble, but this time she is completely out of her depth.One night, while out looking for her, she finds James instead.He's a bossy, sexy and arrogant man who takes it upon himself to protect her, and keep her safe.She shouldn't complain because with her sister intent on making things worse, she needs his help, but her feelings for him confuse her, and even as she's worrying for Ruby's safety, as well as her own, she can't stop thinking about how it would feel if he kissed her...
author: M.J. Perry
